T02D1803:64a-41: pags pa'i rang bzhin ni don yod grub pa'i'o //

T02D1803:69b-36: bo nyid do // de lta mod kyi 'od zer
T02D1803:69b-37: re re 'byung ba na yang 'od zer lnga lnga
T02D1803:69b-39: khams kyi dkyil 'khor gcig gis kyang khams bzhi char la khyab pa yin no //
T02D1803:69b-40: dkyil 'khor re re la yi ge gsum gyi sngags
T02D1803:69b-41: kyi bdag po 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis
T02D1803:69b-42: rtag tu rang nyid zlos pa yin te /
T02D1803:69b-43: 'di rlung gi de kho na nyid mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1803:69b-44: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02D1803:69b-45: bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis rlung
T02D1803:69b-46: gi de kho na nyid lung dang rtogs pa dag
T02D1803:70a-0: @70a * // da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rang
T02D1803:70a-1: gi mtshan nyid shes par 'tshal na thugs brtse ba
T02D1803:70a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02D1803:70a-5: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02D1803:70a-6: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba gang
T02D1803:70a-7: de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rtsa
T02D1803:70a-8: ba'i rgyu dang rgyud bla ma las sngags tsam gsungs
T02D1803:70a-9: kyi sngags btub ni ma bstan to //
T02D1803:70a-10: bshad pa'i rgyud las ni sngags btu ba dang /
T02D1803:70a-13: sngags kyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa kho nar gsungs so //
T02D1803:70a-14: de nas bshad pa'i rgyud ma rtogs na phyi rol
T02D1803:70a-15: gyi sngags la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis shes
T02D1803:70a-17: de bas na 'bad pas nyon cig / bshad pa'i
T02D1803:70a-18: rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sngags kyi de kho
T02D1803:70a-19: na nyid 'ba' zhig khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1803:70a-20: de la sprul la sogs pa'i sngags rnams ni a'a
T02D1803:70a-21: li k'a li las yang dag par byung ba rnams
T02D1803:70a-22: so // de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni
T02D1803:70a-23: mi shigs pa las byung ba'i yi ge gsum ste
T02D1803:70a-24: so // / gang gi phyir sngags thams cad ni
T02D1803:70a-25: bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi ngo
T02D1803:70a-26: bo nyid kyi man ngag ji ltar thos pas yi
T02D1803:70a-27: ge gsum la rab tu 'jug go //
T02D1803:70a-28: de bas na yi ge gsum ni sngags thams cad kyi bdag po'o /
T02D1803:70a-29: 'de ni yang re re zhing mi shigs pa dang
T02D1803:70a-30: lhan cig yi ge gsum gsum las 'byung ba yin
T02D1803:70a-31: no // da ni yi ge gsum gyi bya ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D1803:70a-32: de la dang por gsum yang dag par sbyor ba las lha'i sku 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:70a-33: de nyid 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i
T02D1803:70a-34: rim gyis lus nyin mtshan du 'dzin par byed do
T02D1803:70a-35: // de nyid a'a li k'a li rnams dang lhan
T02D1803:70a-36: cig dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su
T02D1803:70a-37: kha thur du bltas par gyur bas gsang ba'i sna'i
T02D1803:70a-38: bu gnas sa bon gyi gzugs kyis byung nas sems
T02D1803:70a-39: can gyi khams rnams skyed par byed do //
T02D1803:70a-40: de nyid srog dang rtsol ba dang lhan cig yang
T02D1803:70a-41: steng du song nas dbang po'i sgo rnams sad par
T02D1803:70a-42: byed cing kun rdzob kyi sna'i sgo nas g-yon dang
T02D1803:70a-43: g-yas la sogs pa'i rim pas byung nas lhun gyis
T02D1803:70a-44: grub pas rdo rje bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1803:70b-0: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnam @70b bar sbyong bar byed do //
T02D1803:70b-1: de nyid nyid mo dang mtshan mo'i rim gyis bzlas
T02D1803:70b-2: pa'i grangs nye bar bzung nas chu la sogs pa'i
T02D1803:70b-4: dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog la gnas nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de //
T02D1803:70b-5: de nyid yi ge'i gzugs su yongs su brtags la lce rtse shin tu mi bskyod cing //
T02D1803:70b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag gi bzlas brjod
T02D1803:70b-7: kyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlas brjod byas nas phyi'i kha
T02D1803:70b-8: dog la sogs pa'i bya ba la brten te zhi
T02D1803:70b-9: ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed do //
T02D1803:70b-10: yi ge gsum po de nyid ni sbyang bar bya ba dang /
T02D1803:70b-12: 'bar bar bya ba pa'i rim gyis kha zas rnam par sbyangs te skyon med par byed do //
T02D1803:70b-13: de ltar lus la gnas pa'i skabs su thams cad bya ste /
T02D1803:70b-14: mthar mi shigs par zhugs nas yang tha mal ba'i lus la brten te /
T02D1803:70b-15: de bzhin du thams cad byed do //
T02D1803:70b-16: da ni yi ge gsum bskyed pa dgongs pa lung
T02D1803:70b-17: ston pa zhes bya pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
T02D1803:70b-18: las gsungs pa / dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na //
T02D1803:70b-19: gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa //
T02D1803:70b-20: de ni bcing med ces bya ste //
T02D1803:70b-21: de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas //
T02D1803:70b-22: dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste //
T02D1803:70b-23: grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa //
T02D1803:70b-24: aas bcings phan tshun sbyor ba la //
T02D1803:70b-25: gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla //
T02D1803:70b-26: gang zhig shes nas rnam grol ba'i //
T02D1803:70b-29: dngos med pas ni dngos spangs pa //
T02D1803:70b-30: 'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1803:70b-31: cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas //
T02D1803:70b-32: lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1803:70b-33: bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar //
T02D1803:70b-34: yi ge a'am bcas ring por bcas //
T02D1803:70b-35: yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang ldan //
T02D1803:70b-36: thung du ma lus ngag tu 'gyur //
T02D1803:70b-37: gcig min du ma ma yin no //
T02D1803:70b-38: ya yi don gyis gang ci 'ang rung //
T02D1803:70b-39: bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pas //
T02D1803:70b-40: ral sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
T02D1803:70b-41: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang //
T02D1803:70b-42: gang yang mngon par phyogs pa rnams //
T02D1803:70b-43: bud med skyed pa ma ning ste //
T02D1803:70b-44: khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni //
T02D1803:70b-45: shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar //
T02D1803:71a-0: drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang @71a * //
T02D1803:71a-1: gcig / dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung //
T02D1803:71a-2: de ni yang sogs don sbyar nas //
T02D1803:71a-4: mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin //
T02D1803:71a-5: 'gro ba rnams ni rgyu mthar bya //
T02D1803:71a-6: brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag / dngos med ngo bo las byung ba //
T02D1803:71a-7: de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs //
T02D1803:71a-8: lha ru nye bar dmigs pa gang //
T02D1803:71a-9: brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa //
T02D1803:71a-10: rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1803:71a-11: ming med brjod du med pa ste //
T02D1803:71a-12: byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no //
T02D1803:71a-13: gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa //
T02D1803:71a-15: 'gag med rab tu zhi ba nyid //
T02D1803:71a-16: rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa //
T02D1803:71a-17: dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i //
T02D1803:71a-18: rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan //
T02D1803:71a-19: 'di nyid kho na don dam ste //
T02D1803:71a-20: so so rang rig mtshan nyid do //
T02D1803:71a-21: bya ba thams cad nyid du yang //
T02D1803:71a-22: rnal 'byor rig pa nyal sogs la //
T02D1803:71a-23: ming med brjod du med pa dang //
T02D1803:71a-24: dus gsum bzlas pa rtag tu bzla //
T02D1803:71a-25: gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa //
T02D1803:71a-26: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga //
T02D1803:71a-27: bzhi po legs par bsdus pa yis //
T02D1803:71a-28: sbyor bzhi bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu //
T02D1803:71a-29: dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa //
T02D1803:71a-30: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim gyis ni //
T02D1803:71a-31: de ni so sor 'byung ba las //
T02D1803:71a-32: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02D1803:71a-33: de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis //
T02D1803:71a-34: phra mo rnal 'byor bstan pa yin //
T02D1803:71a-35: klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi //
T02D1803:71a-36: 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad //
T02D1803:71a-38: de ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid yin par bshad do //
T02D1803:71a-39: rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
T02D1803:71a-40: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi ngag gi yi ge
T02D1803:71a-41: la 'jug par bya ba la ni som nyi ma
T02D1803:71a-43: thung du ma lus tshig tu 'gyur //
T02D1803:71a-45: bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar na thung du zhes
T02D1803:71a-46: bya ba yi ge aa tshig ma lus pa la
T02D1803:71a-48: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02D1803:71a-49: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
T02D1803:71a-50: 'di na gsung rab 'chad pa dag ni by'a ka
T02D1803:71a-51: ra na'i tshig sngon du byas nas sgra'i don 'ba'
T02D1803:71a-52: zhig gi rjes su 'brang gi / yang yi ges
T02D1803:71b-0: brjod pa gang du gang gi phyir ji @71b ltar
T02D1803:71b-1: rab tu 'jug par shes pa ni ma yin no
T02D1803:71b-2: // yi ge'i don de kho na nyid ji lta ba nyid mi shes te /
T02D1803:71b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:71b-4: bstan pa'i rim gyis de khong du chud par bya
T02D1803:71b-5: yis nyon cig / de la sgra ni a'a li
T02D1803:71b-6: k'a li rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1803:71b-7: a'a li ni aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
T02D1803:71b-8: k'a li zhes bya ba ni yi ge ka la sogs pa yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
T02D1803:71b-9: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa'i yi
T02D1803:71b-10: ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu po ma lus shing lus
T02D1803:71b-11: pa med pa thams cad de dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D1803:71b-14: tsheg drag dang bcas pa dang skad kyi byings dang /
T02D1803:71b-17: tshig rnam par sbyar ba dang /
T02D1803:71b-20: bya ba dang de la phan pa'i rkyen la sogs
T02D1803:71b-21: pa nas bshad pa'i mthar thug pa ni by'a ka
T02D1803:71b-22: ra na zhes pa'i ming gi brdas yongs su bshad
T02D1803:71b-24: de bas na de'i tshig dang ngag dang sdeb sbyor dang /
T02D1803:71b-27: rkyang pa dang rgyun chags la sogs pas chos kyi
T02D1803:71b-28: phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo sde dang
T02D1803:71b-33: gar gyi bstan bcos la sogs pa 'jig rten las
T02D1803:71b-34: 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnams yang dag par 'byung ste
T02D1803:71b-35: / bstan bcos la brten nas dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02D1803:71b-36: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs
T02D1803:71b-37: ba'i mdo las kyang blo gros chen po 'di lta
T02D1803:71b-38: ste / skyes bu la la zhig mar me thogs
T02D1803:71b-39: nas phyogs 'di na nga'i nor 'di lta bu 'di
T02D1803:71b-40: yod do zhes nor lta ba de bzhin du blo
T02D1803:71b-41: gros chen po tshig tu rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i
T02D1803:71b-42: mar mes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
T02D1803:71b-43: rnams tshig gi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba
T02D1803:71b-44: so so rang gis rig pa'i don gyi yul la
T02D1803:71b-45: rjes su 'jug go zhes gsungs so //
T02D1803:71b-46: 'on kyang tshig de rnams kyi tshig dang ngag la
T02D1803:71b-47: sogs par gtogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyi bye brag
T02D1803:71b-48: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba ni aa zhes bya
T02D1803:72a-0: gang gi phyir aa dang yang dag par ldan par ma @72a * //
T02D1803:72a-1: gyur pa'i ka la sogs ba'i yi ge ni yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1803:72a-2: mtha' can yin pa'i phyir tshig tu mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:72a-3: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las /
T02D1803:72a-4: aa ni yig 'bru rnams kyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02D1803:72a-5: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D1803:72a-6: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1803:72a-7: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D1803:72a-8: ces gsungs te de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1803:72a-9: bsam gtan ma lus pa'i sgo'i sa bon gyi tshig
T02D1803:72a-10: aa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
T02D1803:72a-11: kyi sgo'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D1803:72a-12: lhan cig skyes pa'i yi ge yin par yang gsungs te /
T02D1803:72a-13: rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:72a-14: aa ni gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1803:72a-15: snying gi dbus na mi shigs pa //
T02D1803:72a-16: 'bar zhing mar me dag dang mtshungs //
T02D1803:72a-17: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
T02D1803:72a-18: aa ni gtso bo dam pa'o //
T02D1803:72a-20: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad aa'i rigs su gyur ba dang /
T02D1803:72a-22: aa las nges par 'byung ba ste /
T02D1803:72a-23: brjod bzhin pa na 'gag pa'i ngo bo nyid ngag
T02D1803:72a-24: gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dag
T02D1803:72a-25: pa ji lta ba nyid shes na sgra dang sgra
T02D1803:72a-26: ma yin pa la ltos pa med par sems can
T02D1803:72a-27: gyi bsam pa'i dbye bas gdul bya'i skye bo rnams
T02D1803:72a-28: la chos ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1803:72a-29: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02D1803:72a-30: blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D1803:72a-31: chen pos don la rton par bya'i yi ge la
T02D1803:72a-33: blo gros chen po yi ge'i phyir 'brang ba'i rigs kyi bu pho'am /
T02D1803:72a-34: rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag kyang don dam pa
T02D1803:72a-35: las nyams par byed cing gzhan yang khong du chud
T02D1803:72a-37: 'di lta ste blo gros chen po la las gcig
T02D1803:72a-38: gis gcig la sor mo'i rtse mos ci zhig bstan
T02D1803:72a-39: na sor mo'i rtse mo nyid la lta zhing 'brang
T02D1803:72a-40: ba de bzhin du blo gros chen po byis pa
T02D1803:72a-41: so so'i skye bo'i sde rnams kyis byis pa'i rang
T02D1803:72a-42: bzhin can lta bu sgra ji bzhin gyi sor mo'i
T02D1803:72a-43: rtse mo la mngon par chags shing zhen to //
T02D1803:72a-44: mngon par zhen cing dus byed de sgra ji bzhin
T02D1803:72b-0: pa'i @72b sor mo'i rtse mo lta bu'i don spangs
T02D1803:72b-1: nas don dam pa la tshol bar mi byed do
T02D1803:72b-2: // de bas na don 'dod pas de bsten par bya'o //
T02D1803:72b-3: de'i phyir na gang sgra ji bzhin pa'i phyin ci
T02D1803:72b-4: log la mngon par zhen pa de ni spang bar
T02D1803:72b-5: bya'o // don btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig
T02D1803:72b-6: la 'jug pa yang rnam ba bzhir bcom ldan 'das
T02D1803:72b-7: kyis mdo sde 'di nyid las gsungs te /
T02D1803:72b-8: blo gros chen po tshig gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T02D1803:72b-9: 'di ltar mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang /
T02D1803:72b-11: gnas ngan len la mngon par zhen pa'i tshig dang /
T02D1803:72b-12: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rnam par rtog pa'i tshig go //
T02D1803:72b-13: blo gros chen po de la mtshan nyid kyi tshig
T02D1803:72b-14: ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs la mtshan
T02D1803:72b-15: mar mngon par zhen pa las byung ngo //
T02D1803:72b-16: blo gros chen po rmi lam gyi tshig ni sngon
T02D1803:72b-17: myong ba'i yul rjes su dran nas rtog pa'i yul
T02D1803:72b-19: yang blo gros chen po gnas ngan len gyi rnam
T02D1803:72b-20: par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa'i tshig ni
T02D1803:72b-21: sngon sgras byas pa'i las rjes su dran pa las
T02D1803:72b-22: 'byung ngo // blo gros chen po thog ma med
T02D1803:72b-23: pa'i dus nas rnam par rtog pa'i tshig ni thog
T02D1803:72b-24: ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa la mngon par
T02D1803:72b-25: zhen pa'i gnas ngan len gyi rang gi sa bon
T02D1803:72b-27: gros chen po tshig gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan
T02D1803:72b-28: nyid rnam pa bzhi'o zhes gang brjod pa de'i phyir
T02D1803:72b-30: rigs pa 'dis na sgra rnams ni yi ge aa
T02D1803:72b-31: las byung bas na mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1803:72b-33: mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'jig pa ste /
T02D1803:72b-34: mi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra'i sgo nas
T02D1803:72b-35: rab tu bstan pa de yang ma bcos pa'i thog
T02D1803:72b-36: ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do
T02D1803:72b-37: // ji skad du tshul gcig bar bstan pa'i mdo las /
T02D1803:72b-38: chos 'di sgra skad dag gis lung bstan te //
T02D1803:72b-39: chos dang sgra dag 'dir ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02D1803:72b-40: chos nyid tshul gcig dngos la'ang 'jug byed pa //
T02D1803:72b-41: bzod mchog bla na med la reg par 'gyur //
T02D1803:72b-43: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:72b-44: gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mtshan
T02D1803:72b-45: nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma
T02D1803:72b-46: byas byed du ma bcug / rjes su yi rang
T02D1803:73a-2: 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
T02D1803:73a-3: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste /
T02D1803:73a-4: de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do //
T02D1803:73a-5: de la gsang ba'i bdag po 'dod pa'i khams kyi
T02D1803:73a-6: dbang phyug la myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1803:73a-8: des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad myos pas brgyal bar byed cing /
T02D1803:73a-9: me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba sna tshogs kyang ston la /
T02D1803:73a-11: nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyang mngon par sprul nas //

T02D1803:94a-25: 'dir sgrub pa po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs pa'o //
T02D1803:94a-26: sgrub pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1803:94a-27: bsgrub par bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1803:94a-28: de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gnyis su
T02D1803:94a-29: med par bya ba yongs su shes pa ni 'dir
T02D1803:94a-30: sgom pa nyid du bshad do //
T02D1803:94a-31: ji skad du thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:94a-32: 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas btab cing //
T02D1803:94a-33: rgyu yang 'bras bus rgyas btab par //
T02D1803:94a-34: bsgom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni //
T02D1803:94a-37: spyod pa rnam par dag pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1803:94a-38: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtogs par gyur nas mnyam par gzhag pa dang ;
T02D1803:94a-39: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs su gnyis su med par 'gyur la /
T02D1803:94a-40: de gnyis su med na su zhig spyod pa rnams spyod de /
T02D1803:94a-41: ji ltar byed pa po med par gyur pas bya
T02D1803:94a-42: ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten
T02D1803:94b-0: yang brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa med par @94b thog
T02D1803:94b-1: ma med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags zad par
T02D1803:94b-2: bya bar ni mi nus so //
T02D1803:94b-3: zhes lung las bshad pa dang 'jig rten du grags so //
T02D1803:94b-4: ji skad du gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:94b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02D1803:94b-6: yang dang yang du bskul bar bya //
T02D1803:94b-8: ji skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
T02D1803:94b-9: rkang brgyad bya ba spangs na ni //
T02D1803:94b-10: 'khor ba'i tshogs ni dor nas su //
T02D1803:94b-11: rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis //
T02D1803:94b-12: rdo rje sems mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02D1803:94b-13: 'gyod dang gnyid dang rmugs la sogs //
T02D1803:94b-14: rab tu 'bad de sbang bar bya //
T02D1803:94b-15: gzhan du bskal pa bye bar ni //
T02D1803:94b-18: de bas na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1803:94b-19: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas thog ma med
T02D1803:94b-20: pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi stobs spangs nas
T02D1803:94b-21: / lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod
T02D1803:94b-22: pas spyod pa spyad na spyod do zhe'am mi spyod
T02D1803:94b-23: do zhes bya ba'i yid la byed pa spangs nas
T02D1803:94b-24: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad zil gyis mnan te /
T02D1803:94b-25: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1803:94b-26: de bas na yang dag par gyur pa'i spyod pa
T02D1803:94b-27: de bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi drin gyis ci
T02D1803:94b-28: nus par rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1803:94b-29: de la thog mkho nar bcom ldan 'das spyod pa
T02D1803:94b-30: mdzad pa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs
T02D1803:94b-31: su gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad de
T02D1803:94b-32: dga' ldan gyi gnas nas bab par mdzad nas rgyud
T02D1803:94b-33: la sogs pa'i tshul rnam pa bzhir bstan te /
T02D1803:94b-34: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
T02D1803:94b-35: dman pa la mos pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden
T02D1803:94b-36: pa rnam pa bzhi rtogs par mdzad cing 'dod chags
T02D1803:94b-37: dang bral ba'i spyod pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1803:94b-38: yang rgya chen po la mngon par zhen pa rnams
T02D1803:94b-39: la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la sogs pa
T02D1803:94b-40: chos bdag med pa rtogs par mdzad cing sa dang
T02D1803:94b-41: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ston par mdzad
T02D1803:94b-42: pa dang / yang 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
T02D1803:94b-43: zab mo la lhag par mos pa rnams la 'dod
T02D1803:94b-44: chags kyis bden pa gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1803:94b-45: 'dod chags kyi chos ston par mdzad pa yin no
T02D1803:95a-0: // de bas na bden pa gnyis yongs su gzung ba'i lus @95a * //
T02D1803:95a-1: dngos po'i don ma lus pa yongs su gcod par
T02D1803:95a-2: byed cing bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu'i mchog la
T02D1803:95a-3: mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyan thos dang mdo
T02D1803:95a-4: sde'i tshul dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma gsungs te
T02D1803:95a-5: / gang gi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa ni
T02D1803:95a-6: dman pa la lhag par mos shing rnam par rtog
T02D1803:95a-8: bdag la bsgrub pa dang bral ba /
T02D1803:95a-9: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bya ba'i lam la zhugs pa /
T02D1803:95a-10: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes la dad pa med pa /
T02D1803:95a-11: thar ba dang rgyang ring ba zhes bya ba bde
T02D1803:95a-12: ba'i thabs ma rtogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu
T02D1803:95a-13: gnyis la sogs pa spyod pa dga' ba rnams kyis
T02D1803:95a-14: dus ring por byang chub tshol bar byed mod kyi
T02D1803:95a-15: / 'on kyang thob par mi byed de /
T02D1803:95a-16: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ma rtogs shing khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:95a-17: de bas na 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1803:95a-18: gang zhig dge slong dngos gnas dang //
T02D1803:95a-19: gang yang rtog la dga' ba'i mi //
T02D1803:95a-20: gang zhig rgan por gnas gyur pa //
T02D1803:95a-21: de la de nyid mi bstan to //
T02D1803:95a-23: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1803:95a-24: thabs dang mi ldan ye shes dang //
T02D1803:95a-25: bslab pa dag kyang bshad pa ni //
T02D1803:95a-26: dpa' bo chen pos nyan thos rnams //
T02D1803:95a-27: de la gzud pa'i phyir bshad do //
T02D1803:95a-30: dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam //
T02D1803:95a-31: byed pa ye shes spangs pa'o //
T02D1803:95a-33: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1803:95a-34: dge slong nyan thos theg pa la mi bslab //
T02D1803:95a-35: byang chub spyod pa de la bslab bya ste //
T02D1803:95a-36: byang chub spyod pa sangs rgyas yon tan dang //
T02D1803:95a-37: gleng gzhi 'di las rang 'byung dag tu 'gyur //
T02D1803:95a-39: de bas na khyad par gyi rgyu las khyad par gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:95a-40: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa lnga'i
T02D1803:95a-41: yul rnams la khyad par gyi longs spyod kyi ngo
T02D1803:95a-42: bor gyur pas khyad par gyi 'bras bu thob par
T02D1803:95a-43: 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1803:95a-44: gzhan du spyod pa dka' ba rnams kyis sems rtse gcig pa 'thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1803:95a-45: dbang po lnga tshar bcad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:95b-0: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal mchog dang po'i @95b rgyud las /
T02D1803:95b-1: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas //
T02D1803:95b-2: lus skam 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal la //
T02D1803:95b-3: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yengs pas //
T02D1803:95b-4: g-yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D1803:95b-7: dka' thub dka' spyad mi bzad pas //
T02D1803:95b-9: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
T02D1803:95b-12: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02D1803:95b-13: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste //
T02D1803:95b-16: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams ni
T02D1803:95b-17: nyon mongs pa rab tu skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa
T02D1803:95b-18: yin pas ngan song gi rgyu yin par bcom ldan
T02D1803:95b-20: ji ltar na yang de dag bstan par gyur pas
T02D1803:95b-21: bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1803:95b-22: zhes bgyi ba phan tshun 'gal bar mi 'gyur lags
T02D1803:95b-23: sam ; rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02D1803:95b-24: rdo rje slob ma khyod gang 'dod chags la spyod
T02D1803:95b-25: pa rnams kyi the tshom med par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1803:95b-26: / yongs su 'dri bar byed pa legs so legs so //
T02D1803:95b-27: de bas na don chen po bstan par bya yis
T02D1803:95b-28: nyon cig / nyon mongs pa rnams ni nyan thos
T02D1803:95b-29: la sogs pa dmigs par lta ba rnams kyi nyon
T02D1803:95b-30: mongs pa rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur te /
T02D1803:95b-31: nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:95b-32: ngo bo nyid yongs su shes na ni byang chub
T02D1803:95b-33: kyi rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo
T02D1803:95b-35: ji skad du dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1803:95b-36: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
T02D1803:95b-38: dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na //
T02D1803:95b-39: dug ni dug med byas pa yin //
T02D1803:95b-40: bdud rtsi rim gyis brten nas ni //
T02D1803:95b-41: bdud rtsi nyid du 'gyur ba'ang yin //
T02D1803:95b-43: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02D1803:95b-45: dper na grong khyer chen po'i lud gang yin pa de ni bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang /
T02D1803:95b-47: rgun 'brum gyi zhing dag la phan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1803:96a-0: 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' @96a * //
T02D1803:96a-1: nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de yang thams
T02D1803:96a-2: cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin
T02D1803:96a-3: no // 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na sngags
T02D1803:96a-4: dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis 'chi
T02D1803:96a-6: 'od srungs de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs mkhas
T02D1803:96a-7: pas yongs su zin pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis
T02D1803:96a-8: kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so zhes
T02D1803:96a-9: gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang 'dul ba don yod
T02D1803:96a-10: par grub pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i
T02D1803:96a-11: gsungs pa dang / rgyud las kyang / gang gis blun po 'ching gyur pa //
T02D1803:96a-12: de yis mkhas pa yongs grol zhes //
T02D1803:96a-13: byang chub rnam par bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1803:96a-14: 'di dag thams cad phyin ci log / gang gis rmongs pa 'ching 'gyur zhing //
T02D1803:96a-16: de nyid kyis ni grol 'gyur zhing //
T02D1803:96a-17: shes rab stobs kyis bde ba thob //
T02D1803:96a-19: rigs pa 'dis ni khyad par can bskul bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1803:96a-20: khyad par can gyis yongs su bskul par gyur pas
T02D1803:96a-21: khyad par can gyi 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba
T02D1803:96a-22: skyed pa'i rgyur gyur par zhugs pa'i bla na med
T02D1803:96a-23: pa'i bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu thob par bya
T02D1803:96a-24: ba la sgrub pa gzhan med de /
T02D1803:96a-25: de'i don du de nyid kyis bza' ba dang gnas
T02D1803:96a-26: la sogs pa bde ba rnams kyis yon tan gyi
T02D1803:96a-27: dbang phyug brgyad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i thams
T02D1803:96a-28: cad mkhyen pa'i phun sum tshogs pa mngon sum du
T02D1803:96a-31: des na bde ba bde nyid kyis //
T02D1803:96a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur //
T02D1803:96a-34: de la 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1803:96a-36: spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1803:96a-38: shin tu spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1803:96a-39: de la spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa gang zhe na /
T02D1803:96a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02D1803:96a-42: rdo rje 'chang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ji skad du
T02D1803:96a-43: bstan ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi aa
T02D1803:96a-44: ra li rgyas pa de ni spros pa dang bcas
T02D1803:96a-45: pa'o // de la spros pa med pa ni gang yin zhe na /
T02D1803:96a-46: rtag tu khyab pa las dgos pa'i dbang du 'ga'
T02D1803:96a-47: zhig la rol pa de ni spros pa med pa'o
T02D1803:96b-0: // shin tu spros @96b pa med pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D1803:96b-1: 'du 'dzi thams cad rnam par spangs nas bsam gtan gyi zas dang /
T02D1803:96b-3: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1803:96b-4: snyoms par 'jug pa las goms pa de ni shin tu spros pa med pa ste /
T02D1803:96b-5: dper na shing tshig bar gyur kyang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:96b-6: t'a la'i lo ma tshig par gyur kyang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:96b-7: ras bal gyi lo ma tshig par gyur kyang thal
T02D1803:96b-8: bar 'gyur te thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ro
T02D1803:96b-9: // de bzhin du spyod pa gsum char gyis kyang
T02D1803:96b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang mngon par 'dod pa
T02D1803:96b-12: yang sgrub pa po la ni de kho na nyid
T02D1803:96b-13: bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs
T02D1803:96b-14: nas lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1803:96b-16: stang stabs la sogs pa'i tshul dang /
T02D1803:96b-17: gar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rtag tu brtson pa'i yid dang /
T02D1803:96b-18: nyin dang mtshan du spros pa dang bcas pa'i mchod
T02D1803:96b-19: pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub par byed
T02D1803:96b-20: do // de bzhin du la la ni dpal mchog
T02D1803:96b-21: dang po la sogs pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
T02D1803:96b-22: la brten nas skyil mo krung gi 'dug stangs dang
T02D1803:96b-23: do // / nyams rnam pa dgu la sogs pa
T02D1803:96b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol mo spros
T02D1803:96b-25: pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1803:96b-27: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di las ni spros pa
T02D1803:96b-28: med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa'i gnas
T02D1803:96b-30: da ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dpal
T02D1803:96b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
T02D1803:96b-32: 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba
T02D1803:96b-33: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste
T02D1803:96b-34: / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1803:96b-35: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa //
T02D1803:96b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1803:96b-37: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1803:96b-38: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1803:96b-39: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1803:96b-40: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde 'byung ba //
T02D1803:96b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog / rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras //
T02D1803:96b-42: dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1803:96b-43: bla re dam pa bres pa na //
T02D1803:96b-44: rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs //
T02D1803:96b-45: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
T02D1803:96b-46: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D1803:97a-0: mar me dri dang sogs ldan @97a * //
T02D1803:97a-2: / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1803:97a-3: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub //
T02D1803:97a-4: yang na srid pa gsum dag gam //
T02D1803:97a-5: yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam //
T02D1803:97a-6: skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub //
T02D1803:97a-7: der ni dang por gdan bsham ste //
T02D1803:97a-9: sna tshogs padmo ras kyis g-yogs //
T02D1803:97a-10: der ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan //
T02D1803:97a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1803:97a-12: sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul bas //
T02D1803:97a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02D1803:97a-14: de ni rnam par 'phrul par mdzad //
T02D1803:97a-15: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //
T02D1803:97a-16: de bzhin srog dang rtsol las byung //
T02D1803:97a-17: rang gi lha la mngon phyogs pa'i //
T02D1803:97a-18: grub pa'i phyag rgyas rab tu bskor //
T02D1803:97a-19: lugs ma'am yang na 'bur dang ni //
T02D1803:97a-20: mngon par 'dus byas legs bris pa //
T02D1803:97a-21: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs brnyan ni //
T02D1803:97a-22: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag / stan de dag ni thams cad la //
T02D1803:97a-23: ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod //
T02D1803:97a-24: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1803:97a-25: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
T02D1803:97a-26: rdo rje rin chen padma sogs //
T02D1803:97a-27: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02D1803:97a-28: rang gi lha dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1803:97a-29: bud med dag ni legs bslabs pa //
T02D1803:97a-30: skal bzang rang bzhin phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D1803:97a-31: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02D1803:97a-33: mdo'i tshig de rnams kyi don rgya cher dgrol bar bya ste /
T02D1803:97a-34: de la dang po kho nas skyed mos tshal la
T02D1803:97a-35: sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par
T02D1803:97a-36: dben pa'i gnas su tshul dang mi mthun pa la
T02D1803:97a-37: sogs pa skal ba ngan pa rnams dang bral ba'i
T02D1803:97a-38: gnas dag tu so phag las byas pa'i khang pa
T02D1803:97a-39: sum brtsegs la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan
T02D1803:97a-41: de la khang pa dang por ni tshang mang gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1803:97a-42: khang pa gnyis par ni pi wang la sogs pa
T02D1803:97a-43: glu gar dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams
T02D1803:97a-44: gzhag par bya'o // khang pa gsum par ni rnal
T02D1803:97a-45: 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dpal sna tshogs
T02D1803:97a-46: skal ba bzang po'i mchog gnas par bya'o //
T02D1803:97a-47: yang na sa'i khang par rab tu brtan pa la
T02D1803:97a-48: sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa rgyan rnam
T02D1803:97b-0: rdo rje'i @97b rang bzhin gyi sa'i cha la shel dang /
T02D1803:97b-4: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin can ri'i rgyal po ri
T02D1803:97b-5: rab la rdo rje rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas
T02D1803:97b-6: khang du rnam par bsams te /
T02D1803:97b-7: gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa //
T02D1803:97b-8: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas //
T02D1803:97b-9: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1803:97b-10: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas pa //
T02D1803:97b-11: dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras //
T02D1803:97b-12: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1803:97b-13: dril bu ba dan legs par mdzes //
T02D1803:97b-14: rnga yab la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1803:97b-15: sgo yi mtshams ni thams cad dang //
T02D1803:97b-16: mtshams su zla phyed rdo rje ldan //
T02D1803:97b-17: skas dang rta babs sgo la sogs //
T02D1803:97b-18: sna tshogs padmas mdzes byas pa //
T02D1803:97b-20: der sgrub po bla ma las gnang ba thob pas
T02D1803:97b-21: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D1803:97b-22: phyug rnams legs par mchod pa lhan cig spyod ba
T02D1803:97b-23: dang / rjes su spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig

T02D1803:97b-32: 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul gyis 'dug nas gzugs kyi
T02D1803:97b-33: yul la spyod par byed do //
T02D1803:97b-34: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bud med
T02D1803:97b-35: kyi sgyu ma lta bur rab tu bstan par bya
T02D1803:97b-36: ba'i phyir la la ni bde mchog sgyu ma lta
T02D1803:97b-37: bus 'dod chags kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyis

T02D1803:97b-43: kyi ngo bo nyid kyis nub phyogs su gnas so
T02D1803:97b-44: // la la ni sha shi lta bus srog gi

T02D1803:97b-48: gti mug rnam par spyod pa'i phyir shar lho'i mtshams
T02D1803:97b-49: su gnas so // la la ni chos kyi 'khor
T02D1803:97b-50: lo lta bus khams gsum rgal cing gnon pa'i gnas
T02D1803:98a-0: su gnas so // rnam @98a * // par sbyong bas lho nub mtshams su gnas so //
T02D1803:98a-1: la la ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ma lta

T02D1803:98a-8: la la ni rgyud mangs lta bus sgeg cing pi
T02D1803:98a-9: wang len pas khams gsum dbang du byed cing phyi
T02D1803:98a-10: rol gyi bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas so //

T02D1803:98a-29: skems shing shar phyogs kyi sgo srung byed par gnas
T02D1803:98a-30: // so // la la ni rdo rje phag gdong
T02D1803:98a-31: lta bus khams gsum thams cad sdud cing lho phyogs
T02D1803:98a-32: kyi sgo srung byed par gnas so //
T02D1803:98a-33: la la ni rdo rje snang ba'i gzugs kyis khams
T02D1803:98a-34: gsum la lta zhing nub phyogs kyi sgo srung byed
T02D1803:98a-35: par gnas so // la la ni thal ba rab

T02D1803:98a-37: dang sa steng dang mtho ris su dbugs 'byin cing

T02D1803:98b-44: rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du

T02D1803:99a-0: gdul bya stong pa nyid kyi lta ba can la la dag la bcom ldan @99a * //

T02D1803:100b-33: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor

T02D1803:100b-37: 'bras bu me tog rnams kyis brgyan //

T02D1803:100b-46: ba'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos phyi rol gyi phyag
T02D1803:100b-47: rgya mngon par sbyangs la rigs gcig tu gtogs pa'i
T02D1803:101a-0: @101a * // rang gi slob ma dang lhan cig
T02D1803:101a-1: tu 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis phyag rgya chen
T02D1803:101a-2: po sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1803:101a-3: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1803:101a-4: dang po kho nar don dam pa'i bden pa la
T02D1803:101a-5: dmigs nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis
T02D1803:101a-6: mi bskyod pa phyung ste rjes su bcug nas dkyil
T02D1803:101a-7: 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du gnas la /
T02D1803:101a-8: de nas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal te /
T02D1803:101a-9: mi phyed pa'i 'khor rnams rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1803:101a-10: lta bu'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i rnam par snang
T02D1803:101a-11: mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams su
T02D1803:101a-12: lhag par mos pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha
T02D1803:101a-13: ma lus pa rjes su mnyes par byas la rang
T02D1803:101a-14: gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig ril por 'dzin pa'am
T02D1803:101a-15: / gzhig pa'i rim gyis don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go //
T02D1803:101a-16: de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1803:101a-17: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i don gyi rdo rje sems khyod
T02D1803:101a-18: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1803:101a-19: rnams kyis yang dag par bskul pas bdag la byin
T02D1803:101a-20: gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis skad cig gis langs nas
T02D1803:101a-21: mchog tu dga' ba'i ro myang bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1803:101a-22: nyams rnam pa dgus rol pa mdzad do //
T02D1803:101a-23: de ltar yang nas yang du yang dag pa'i mtha'
T02D1803:101a-24: la rab tu zhugs nas yang nas yang du bzhengs
T02D1803:101a-25: te / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1803:101a-26: du gyur pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams myong
T02D1803:101a-27: te / bar mdzad de / ji ltar yid zhum
T02D1803:101a-28: par mi 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshags pa
T02D1803:101a-29: thams cad kyi aa ra li rdzogs par byed de
T02D1803:101a-30: te / bar mdzad de / / de la rang

T02D1803:101a-32: gsum la rjes su spyod pa byed pa dang /

T02D1803:101a-34: pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang

T02D1803:101a-36: pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang
T02D1803:101a-41: lan tshva la sogs pa'i ro rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed do //
T02D1803:101a-42: de nas lo bcu drug ma skye gnas ma nyams
T02D1803:101a-43: shing nu ma ma khrang zhing rgyas pa'i na chung
T02D1803:101a-44: ji lta bu'i sme sha can dang /
T02D1803:101b-2: gzhan gang yang rung yan lag mi dman pa'am /
T02D1803:101b-3: rtsa lag tu gyur pa'i bud med dang gzhan la'ang des bgrod par bya ste /
T02D1803:101b-4: de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D1803:101b-5: gyi rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid dngos po thams cad
T02D1803:101b-6: kyi bdag nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D1803:101b-8: pa la spyad pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mngon

T02D1803:101b-10: pa spangs te rab tu gsang ba'i gnas na 'dug
T02D1803:101b-12: de bzhin du phyag rgya mi bcing ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-15: mchod rten gyi las mi bya ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-16: glegs bam mi klag pa dang /
T02D1803:101b-17: lus kyi ngal du ba spang ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-18: ras ris dang shing dang rdo'i gzugs brnyan la phyag mi bya ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-19: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-20: tshes grangs dang byed pa dang thang cig dang /
T02D1803:101b-21: skad cig ma'i dus la ltos par mi byed de /
T02D1803:101b-22: 'di dag thams cad ni nang gi bdag nyid kho nas rdzogs par byed do //
T02D1803:101b-23: gal te 'byor pa ma tshang bas bsdus pa'i dkyil
T02D1803:101b-24: 'khor rdzogs par bya bar mi nus par gyur na
T02D1803:101b-25: sgrub pa bo des de kho na nyid rnam pa
T02D1803:101b-26: lngas kyang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la rim
T02D1803:101b-28: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1803:101b-29: la la ni gzugs rdo rje ma lta bus lag pa'i padma 'jam pa dang /
T02D1803:101b-30: me long thogs nas zhi ba'i mig gis lta zhing
T02D1803:101b-31: mu tig gi chun 'phyang ma lus par 'khrol zhing
T02D1803:101b-33: nu ma rgyas shing cung zad mnyen pa dang /
T02D1803:101b-34: gos grol zhing ro smad cung zad ston pas bde
T02D1803:101b-35: pa chen pos rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1803:101b-36: shar lho'i mtshams su gnas so //
T02D1803:101b-37: la la ni sgra rdo rje ma lta bus mig rnam par 'byed cing lta ba dang /
T02D1803:101b-38: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pas rol cing 'gying bag
T02D1803:101b-39: dang bcas pas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos ston
T02D1803:101b-40: pa 'chad pa la mkhas shing dge ba'i gtam smra
T02D1803:101b-41: zhing rab tu glu len la ko ki la'i glu'i
T02D1803:101b-42: rjes su pi wang gi rol mo rab tu rdung
T02D1803:101b-43: bas lho nub kyi mtshams su gnas so //
T02D1803:102a-1: dri rdo rje ma lta bus 'dzum pa dang bcas
T02D1803:102a-2: pa'i mig gis lta bar byed cing sor mo mthon
T02D1803:102a-3: po bimba lta bu'i 'od kyis rnam par mdzes pa
T02D1803:102a-4: zangs ltar dmar zhing dra bas 'brel ba'i lag pa'i
T02D1803:102a-5: rtse mos gar byed pa lta bus nor bu'i rang
T02D1803:102a-6: bzhin gyi snod 'dzin cing gur kum dang ;
T02D1803:102a-9: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang /
T02D1803:102a-10: ga pur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis bsgos pas
T02D1803:102a-11: phyogs bcu ma lus pa dris khyab par byed pa'i
T02D1803:102a-12: dri'i snod thogs te nub byang gi mtshams su gnas
T02D1803:102a-13: so // la la ni ro rdo rje ma lta
T02D1803:102a-14: bus brtse ba dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta bar
T02D1803:102a-15: byed cing gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang /
T02D1803:102a-16: rin po che dpag tu med pa'i snod thogs te /
T02D1803:102a-17: tshod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i ro'i mchog rnams dang /
T02D1803:102a-18: lha'i kha zas bdud rtsi chen po dang bcas pa
T02D1803:102a-19: mthun pa'i kha zas thogs nas byang shar mtshams su
T02D1803:102a-20: gnas so // la la ni reg rdo rje ma
T02D1803:102a-21: lta bus lus mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro
T02D1803:102a-22: gnyer gsum gyis mngon par mdzes pa /
T02D1803:102a-23: dbus shin tu phra ba rgyal mtshan ltar lte ba
T02D1803:102a-24: rgya che zhing g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing zab pa
T02D1803:102a-25: sku smad lci ba 'gros dal zhing shin tu sgeg
T02D1803:102a-26: pa bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas shing zhi bas lta
T02D1803:102a-27: ba bde ba chen po rjes su mnyes par bya
T02D1803:102a-28: ba'i phyir phang par nye bar bzhag nas gnas so
T02D1803:102a-29: // de nas bde ba chen po'i dpal rab tu dga' ba'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D1803:102a-34: pu la ka t'a da na dang /
T02D1803:102a-35: da sha na kha da na dang /
T02D1803:102a-39: kur pa ral sogs pa'i ka ran dang /
T02D1803:102a-40: rab tu rmongs pas mu tig gi chun 'phyang bskyed cing du bu dang /
T02D1803:102a-42: rkang gdub kyi sgra dang ldan par yul dang /
T02D1803:102a-49: shes bya la snyoms par zhugs shing a'a li k'a li dang /
T02D1803:102a-53: n'a di gsum tyam ku las rab tu bskul bas
T02D1803:102a-54: phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de

T02D1803:102b-1: rgyun lta bus zhu bar gyur nas ye shes kyi

T02D1803:102b-3: yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro //

T02D1803:102b-7: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //

T02D1803:102b-10: med na de'i tshe reg bya rdo rje gcig pu

T02D1803:102b-14: 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin la lha mo
T02D1803:102b-15: thams cad ni reg bya rdo rje'i lus kyi dkyil
T02D1803:102b-16: 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin te /
T02D1803:102b-17: de bas na mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal gyis rnam
T02D1803:102b-18: par mi rtog par bslab bar bya'o zhes rab tu
T02D1803:102b-21: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1803:102b-22: thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1803:102b-23: cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len
T02D1803:102b-24: pa'i spyod pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1803:102b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
T02D1803:102b-27: lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pas ni //
T02D1803:102b-28: rang gi ngo bor de byas na //
T02D1803:102b-29: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1803:102b-30: de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1803:102b-31: thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs //
T02D1803:102b-32: chen po kha dog dkar bo 'dra //
T02D1803:102b-33: sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams //
T02D1803:102b-34: cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya //
T02D1803:102b-35: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni //
T02D1803:102b-36: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1803:102b-37: bzhin sdug mig ni dkyus ring pa //
T02D1803:102b-38: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02D1803:102b-39: spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod pas //
T02D1803:102b-40: rdo rje mtshan mas bsgom par bya //
T02D1803:102b-41: phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes //
T02D1803:102b-42: sngags dang rgyud ni legs par bslabs //
T02D1803:102b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya //
T02D1803:102b-44: sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa //
T02D1803:102b-45: brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni //
T02D1803:102b-46: gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya //
T02D1803:102b-47: sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi //
T02D1803:102b-48: bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya //
T02D1803:102b-50: bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che //
T02D1803:103a-0: zla ba drug gis de dag @103a * //

T02D1803:103a-11: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten //

T02D1803:103a-21: do // ro // don 'di nyid gsal bar bya

T02D1803:103a-23: do // ro // rgyud las ; dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te //

T02D1803:103a-27: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T02D1803:103a-29: // / da ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la 'jug bar bya ste /
T02D1803:103a-30: ri bo shin tu dpen pa'am //

T02D1803:103a-35: pa'i sa phyogs su kha zas sbyor ba'i phyir gnod
T02D1803:103a-36: sbyin mo mngag gzhug mo la sogs pa bsgrub par
T02D1803:103a-37: bya'o // yang na sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gam //
T02D1803:103a-38: tshogs chen po'i kha zas tsam bsgrubs nas rim pa
T02D1803:103a-39: 'dis shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la
T02D1803:103a-40: 'jug par bya'o // de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /

T02D1803:103a-42: ba thog ma med pa can gyi sdug bsngal dran

T02D1803:103a-44: ba 'dod pas 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spang
T02D1803:103a-45: bar bya zhing tha na rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
T02D1803:103a-46: la'ang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1803:103a-47: gnyis pa til 'phur la'ang dngos por 'dzin pa'i blo spang par bya'o //

T02D1803:103b-2: // ji skad du ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las /
T02D1803:103b-3: rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1803:103b-4: sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing
T02D1803:103b-5: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1803:103b-6: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T02D1803:103b-7: bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la ltos pa med

T02D1803:103b-11: rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1803:103b-12: phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

T02D1803:103b-14: de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub
T02D1803:103b-15: thob pa'i phyir dngos grub gang ci yang rung ba
T02D1803:103b-16: la tshol bar mi byed de /
T02D1803:103b-17: 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i ngag gi dngos grub dang /
T02D1803:103b-18: mngag gzhug pa'i dngos grub dang /

T02D1803:103b-21: rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang /
T02D1803:103b-23: dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub dang /

T02D1803:104a-5: ji srid phung po'i zam tog yod pa de srid
T02D1803:104a-6: kyi bar du ni rnam par shes pa gsum gyi
T02D1803:104a-7: ngo bo ste / rang bzhin gyis snang ba 'gro ba dag dang gzhan la snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:104a-10: gnyis pa ni rang bzhin no //
T02D1803:104a-11: de rlung dang bcas pas gang phyogs bcur 'khor ba ste /
T02D1803:104a-14: 'dod chags bar ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1803:104a-21: tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang bzhin
T02D1803:104a-22: brgya drug cu nyin mtshan du yid la byas nas
T02D1803:104a-23: ma rig ba rang 'gags shing yang langs nas rlung
T02D1803:104a-24: gi dbang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1803:104a-25: des lus dkrugs nas ji srid du mig la sogs
T02D1803:104a-26: pa'i dbang po yul la dmigs pa de srid du
T02D1803:104a-27: de nyid du dmigs par 'gyur te /
T02D1803:104a-28: thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:104a-29: de nas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu goms pas
T02D1803:104a-30: bdag med pa'i chos la bslabs pas rnam par bsres
T02D1803:104a-31: pa'i sbyor ba khong du chud nas rang bzhin gyis
T02D1803:104a-32: snang ba dang gcig tu 'dre bar bya ste /
T02D1803:104a-33: rim pa 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1803:104a-34: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1803:104a-35: phung po la sogs pa ni khams phra ba la gzhug go //
T02D1803:104a-36: khams phra ba ni yang sems la gzhug go //
T02D1803:104a-37: sems ni yang ma rig pa la gzhug ste /
T02D1803:104a-38: de ltar sbyar nas gnyid log par byed do //
T02D1803:104a-39: de la dus 'dir ni sems dang sems pa ma
T02D1803:104a-40: rig pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i skad cig la
T02D1803:104a-42: phyis ni brjod pa yang med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1803:104a-43: yang grol ba na rlung gi rang bzhin rnyed de /
T02D1803:104a-44: gang gi tshe rmi lam gzhan dag 'byung ba ni
T02D1803:104a-45: ji srid du rnam par shes pa mi g-yo ba
T02D1803:104a-46: de srid du gnyis log nas 'od gal ba la
T02D1803:104a-47: blta ste / de ni so sor rang gis rig
T02D1803:104a-48: pa lus dang ngag dang sems dang bral ba'i don
T02D1803:104a-49: dam pa'i bden pa nang gi mngon par byang chub
T02D1803:104b-1: rim pa 'dis lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1803:104b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams gsad par bya zhing
T02D1803:104b-3: de bzhin nyid la gzhug par byas nas skal ba
T02D1803:104b-4: bzang po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1803:104b-5: spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa'i
T02D1803:104b-6: spyod pa la ltos pa med pas shin tu myur
T02D1803:104b-7: bar 'dir rang gi gzugs yongs su brjed par 'gyur
T02D1803:104b-8: ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1803:104b-9: don 'di nyid dgongs ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:104b-10: gzugs sogs nang gi chos rnams ni //
T02D1803:104b-11: mthong ba lhag mthong zhes brjod la //
T02D1803:104b-12: mi bskyod la sogs grangs bzhin du //
T02D1803:104b-13: brtags pa dag ni zhi gnas yin //
T02D1803:104b-14: 'di dag dngos med gyur pa yi //
T02D1803:104b-15: de bzhin nyid ni zhi bar bshad //
T02D1803:104b-16: de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1803:104b-17: rnal 'byor ba yis sangs rgyas gzhug / ces gsungs pa dang /
T02D1803:104b-18: yang lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1803:104b-19: mya ngan 'das pa'i mi bzad mes //
T02D1803:104b-20: thal ba'ang lus par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1803:104b-21: des na der ni dbang don dang //
T02D1803:104b-22: khams rnams 'dir ni yod pa ma yin //
T02D1803:104b-24: rim pa 'dis ni lung dang rigs pa dag gis
T02D1803:104b-25: mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas thams
T02D1803:104b-26: cad kyi yum nges par byas nas /
T02D1803:104b-27: yul la zhen pa dang rol pa thams cad spangs te /
T02D1803:104b-28: rim pa 'dis bhu su ku tsam gyi spyod pa la spyad de /
T02D1803:104b-30: bhu zhes bya ba ni zas la spyod pa ste
T02D1803:104b-31: de tsam zhig rjes su dran pa dang 'du 'dzi
T02D1803:104b-32: spong bar byed cing dka' thub dang brtul zhugs so
T02D1803:104b-33: zhes gang la'ang bsam par mi bya'o //
T02D1803:104b-34: su zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa ste rnam
T02D1803:104b-35: par shes pa 'di dag ma rig pas nye bar
T02D1803:104b-36: mtshon pas mngon sum du byed do //
T02D1803:104b-37: ma rig pa lcags kyu lta bu de nyid kyis
T02D1803:104b-38: rnam par shes pa gang la'ang 'dre bar mi byed
T02D1803:104b-39: de / 'od gsal ba nyid mngon par 'du byed cing dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1803:104b-40: ku zhes bya ba ni bshang sar 'gro ba ste ;
T02D1803:104b-41: bshang ba dang gci ba 'dor ba'i phyir de tsam
T02D1803:104b-42: zhig rjes su dran par byed cing 'du 'dzi spong
T02D1803:104b-43: bar byed la / lus dang tshor ba dang yul
T02D1803:104b-44: dang dbang po'i ngo bo nyid la sems par mi
T02D1803:104b-45: bar byed la / byed do // shin tu spros
T02D1803:104b-46: pa med pa'i spyod pa smyon pa'i brtul zhugs bshad
T02D1803:105a-0: pa'i mdo las gsungs pa'i rim pas @105a * //
T02D1803:105a-2: de yi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1803:105a-3: gang tshe brtan par mi rtog la //
T02D1803:105a-4: gnas shing 'jig rten pa spangs te //
T02D1803:105a-5: spyod pa thams cad bsdus byas na //
T02D1803:105a-6: de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs //
T02D1803:105a-7: kun du the tshom gcod pa yis //
T02D1803:105a-8: rigs pas byis pa ji bzhin spyad ;
T02D1803:105a-9: / gang tshe chags med rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1803:105a-11: sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang //
T02D1803:105a-12: gti mug sdig la rab gnas na //
T02D1803:105a-13: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1803:105a-14: zla ba drug gis don yod 'grub //
T02D1803:105a-15: rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing //
T02D1803:105a-17: zad med gzhom du med pa dang //
T02D1803:105a-19: bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog /'bad pa med par yang dag 'thob //
T02D1803:105a-20: 'dod pa kun gyi dga' mos rnams //
T02D1803:105a-23: mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag /'od gsal ye shes la mkhas pa //
T02D1803:105a-24: mtshan nyid rtag par rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02D1803:105a-25: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02D1803:105a-26: sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur //
T02D1803:105a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub rab zhugs pa //
T02D1803:105a-28: byin gyi brlab pa mdzad bar 'gyur //
T02D1803:105a-29: de ltar gyur par zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1803:105a-30: ji srid sems ni mi skyo'i phyir //
T02D1803:105a-31: mnyam gzhag yid ni bzang po yis //
T02D1803:105a-32: de la 'bad pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1803:105a-33: de yi 'og tu ci dga' ba'i //
T02D1803:105a-34: spyod pa yis ni spyad byas nas //
T02D1803:105a-35: cung zad spyan phye'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D1803:105a-38: la la rab tu gar byed par //
T02D1803:105a-39: ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar //
T02D1803:105a-40: sgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya //
T02D1803:105a-41: de lta'i dam tshig ldan 'gyur zhing //
T02D1803:105a-42: rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis //
T02D1803:105a-43: dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas //
T02D1803:105a-48: na tshod dang rjes su mthun pas spyod pa rnam pa gsum zla ba phyed dam /
T02D1803:105a-49: zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug bzlas par 'gyur
T02D1803:105a-50: bas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan
T02D1803:105b-0: de la @105b mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin no //
T02D1803:105b-4: yang dag pa thob pa nyid dang /
T02D1803:105b-5: rab tu snang ba nyid dang /
T02D1803:105b-9: yang rmi lam gyi mtshan ma gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D1803:105b-10: byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas //
T02D1803:105b-11: sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungs par mthong //
T02D1803:105b-12: sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku //
T02D1803:105b-13: bdag med pa ni myur du mthong //
T02D1803:105b-14: sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas //
T02D1803:105b-15: mchod pa byed pa des mthong ngo //
T02D1803:105b-16: ye shes chen po 'di yi gzugs //
T02D1803:105b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D1803:105b-18: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis //
T02D1803:105b-19: rtag tu mchod pa byed pa mthong //
T02D1803:105b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang //
T02D1803:105b-21: grags chen rdo rje mchog dag tu //
T02D1803:105b-22: rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong //
T02D1803:105b-23: grags chen rdo rje gsang ba dang //
T02D1803:105b-24: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can //
T02D1803:105b-25: sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i //
T02D1803:105b-27: lus ngag sems kyi mthu las skyes //
T02D1803:105b-28: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1803:105b-29: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang //
T02D1803:105b-30: khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na //
T02D1803:105b-31: de ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1803:105b-32: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rnams //
T02D1803:105b-33: zhing gnas pa nges par mthong //
T02D1803:105b-34: thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang //
T02D1803:105b-35: chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol //
T02D1803:105b-36: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sku //
T02D1803:105b-37: sems can kun gyis yongs bskor ba //
T02D1803:105b-38: bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i //
T02D1803:105b-39: dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1803:105b-40: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02D1803:105b-41: gal te sgrub pa po bden pa mthong yang sngon
T02D1803:105b-42: byi bag chags la goms pa'i stobs kyis zhing dang
T02D1803:105b-45: bsnyen bkur la sogs pas g-yengs nas spyod pa rnam pa gsum spyod pa mi byed pa dang /
T02D1803:105b-46: sgrub pa po gzhan dag 'byor ba ma tshang bas
T02D1803:105b-47: rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'i chog rdzogs par byed
T02D1803:105b-48: mi nus pa'i phyir mi spyod pa de dag ni
T02D1803:105b-49: 'chi ba'i dus byas na yang srid pa gzhan du
T02D1803:105b-51: yang na rdo rje 'chang ba nyid thob par 'gyur /
T02D1803:106a-2: 'di la bsal bya gang yang med //
T02D1803:106a-3: gzhag par bya ba ci yang med //
T02D1803:106a-4: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T02D1803:106a-5: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02D1803:106a-6: zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i dbang du byas pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1803:106a-8: yang dag pa mthong ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mthong bas rtag pa dang /
T02D1803:106a-10: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i lta ba ngan pa 'gag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:106a-11: 'on kyang tha snyad la brten nas 'pho ba rnam par dag pa nges par spyad par bya ste /
T02D1803:106a-12: 'di ni phung po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho bar mi byad de /
T02D1803:106a-13: rtag pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:106a-14: 'jig rten pha rol 'chi ba las gzhan pa nyid las kyang 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02D1803:106a-15: rgyu med pa'i nye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1803:106a-17: mar me las mar me dang /
T02D1803:106a-19: sgra las brag ca dag ni de nyid dam de las gzhan pa zhes brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1803:106a-20: de bas na gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02D1803:106a-21: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02D1803:106a-22: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1803:106a-23: sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D1803:106a-24: mya ngan 'da' bar bstan pa yin //
T02D1803:106a-26: lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02D1803:106a-27: 'di la gang yang rkyen rnams kyis //
T02D1803:106a-28: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
T02D1803:106a-29: btags pa'i rkyen rnams kho na ni //
T02D1803:106a-32: rigs pa 'dis na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas
T02D1803:106a-33: mdzad pa thams cad mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das
T02D1803:106a-34: pa nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1803:106a-35: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par gyur
T02D1803:106a-36: pas kyang thams cad byas nas 'jig rten du mya
T02D1803:106a-37: ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di la so ma
T02D1803:106a-38: nyi mi bya'o // de bas na de kho na
T02D1803:106a-39: nyid shes pa ni rkyen ma tshang bas ji skad
T02D1803:106a-40: du bshad pa'i spyod pa gal te ma spyad du
T02D1803:106a-41: nyi mi bya'o // zin kyang / lta ba thams
T02D1803:106a-42: cad rnam par spangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni
T02D1803:106a-43: don dam pa'i bden pa yin la /
T02D1803:106a-44: skye ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o zhes yang
T02D1803:106a-45: dag par mngon par rtogs nas brgya lam na 'od
T02D1803:106b-0: tha mal pa'i phung po bor nas bdag la @106b
T02D1803:106b-1: byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis ldang bar bya'o zhes
T02D1803:106b-3: de yid la byed pas gnas par byed na /
T02D1803:106b-4: de skye ba gzhan du yid la byed pa de 'dor bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D1803:106b-5: de bas na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
T02D1803:106b-7: bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni //
T02D1803:106b-8: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T02D1803:106b-9: des ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1803:106b-10: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02D1803:106b-12: de bas na 'di dag thams cad ni khyad par
T02D1803:106b-13: can du yongs su bsgyur bas yongs su 'gyur bzhin
T02D1803:106b-14: pas khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1803:106b-16: gang zhig skye ba kun rdzob bden zhes bya //
T02D1803:106b-17: 'chi ba'i ming yang don dam bden pa yin //
T02D1803:106b-18: rim gnyis de dag bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
T02D1803:106b-19: rnyed pa 'di ni ma 'ongs sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1803:106b-20: bden gnyis de la zung du 'jug pa ni //
T02D1803:106b-21: mi 'chad bzhin du de dag khyad par med //
T02D1803:106b-22: mi gnyis mtha' ma gcig pu kho nar ni //
T02D1803:106b-23: shes pa de 'dir bcings nas grol pa yin //
T02D1803:106b-24: ri dbang rtse las 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na //
T02D1803:106b-25: ltung bar mi 'dod kyang ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D1803:106b-26: bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob na //
T02D1803:106b-27: grol bar mi 'dod kyang ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1803:106b-28: 'jig rten dag na don yod gsung gi de nyid rtogs mthu 'gro ba la med de //
T02D1803:106b-29: mtsho chen chu la drag po'i rlung gis kun du g-yengs pa'i til mar thigs pa 'dra //
T02D1803:106b-30: des na bdag gis cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bsdu bar byas pa ni //
T02D1803:106b-31: mthar thug kun rdzob kyis 'jigs skal ldan skye bo'i blo la sgron ma lta bu yin //
T02D1803:106b-32: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D1803:106b-34: // / spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon chen
T02D1803:106b-35: po a'arya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa
